mcpConnect.title: Connect your tools to AI assistants
mcpConnect.subtitle: Your MCP tools work instantly with Claude, Gemini, Cursor and more. One-click setup, no configuration needed.
mcpConnect.mcpServerDescription: This is your MCP server's address. Use it to connect to any supported AI assistant.
mcpConnect.noEnvironments: No environments available. Please create an environment first.

claudeDesktop.title: Connect to Claude Desktop
claudeDesktop.description: Use your tools directly in Claude's desktop app. One-click installation.
claudeDesktop.hint: Downloads .json file. Replace YOUR_TOKEN_HERE with your Agent Token from Token Management.

claudeCode.title: Connect to Claude Code
claudeCode.description: Access your tools from the command line. Quick setup with a single command.
claudeCode.hint: Copies command. Paste in your terminal.

geminiCLI.title: Connect to Gemini CLI
geminiCLI.description: Access your tools from the command line. Quick setup with a single command.
geminiCLI.hint: Copies command. Paste in your terminal.

cursor.title: Connect to Cursor
cursor.description: AI-powered code editor with built-in tool support. Click to connect instantly.
